title: Rape: the right to resist
creator_credit: Mercenary Productions, Elinor Shields and Pat Shields
brief_description: Presents the positive options that a woman has available to her under attack or attempted rape conditions. Shows her how to face her assailant and the strategies to be employed in evading and ultimately escaping.
creator_credit_for_label: Mercenary Productions, Elinor Shields and Pat Shields
